meanings.definition: Not requiring much effort or skill.
meanings.sent1: The undemanding task of watering plants only takes a few minutes.
meanings.sent2: Watching a movie is an undemanding activity that helps me relax.
meanings.sent3: He found the undemanding puzzle so easy that he completed it in record time.
meanings.sent4: The undemanding nature of the job made it perfect for beginners.
meanings.sent5: The undemanding exercise routine was perfect for those just starting out.

meanings.sent1: The undemanding math problem was quickly solved by the student.
meanings.sent2: The instructions were undemanding, making the project a breeze.
meanings.sent3: She appreciated the undemanding recipe that allowed her to cook a delicious meal effortlessly.
meanings.sent4: The undemanding language used in the book made it accessible to readers of all ages.
meanings.sent5: The undemanding game rules made it enjoyable for players of all skill levels.
